DOC.brief_summary: This NIH-NCCAM fund epidemiologic research conduct observational prospective case-control study use Complementary Alternative Medicine ( CAM ) Integrated Oncology ( IO ) effect breast cancer patient community setting . Hypothesis : IO service improve patient ' quality life decrease cancer recurrence rate breast cancer patient compare woman similar disease state prognoses receive IO care , may may use CAM treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Integrative Oncology Outcomes Study Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: The patient enrol study include patient meet follow criterion : Cohort 1 : IO clinic breast cancer patient 1 . Confirmed breast cancer primary breast cancer ICD9 code 174.x , 233.0 V10.3 2 . Female 3 . ≥18 year age 4 . Can provide sign informed consent 5 . 1st IO clinic visit ≤3 month prior enrollment 6 . Can read understand questionnaire Cohort 1A : Subcohort IO clinic patient ( case ) meet follow additional criterion match control find CSS database . 1 . ICD9 code 174.x 233.0 2 .
